title: How to use the focus state to improve your TV App
description: After my first experience with designing for TV I was surprised and excited about the differences compared to designing for mobile or desktop. Hence I wrote down my learnings which got published under 'Bootcamp'.

title: A compass for page layouts
description: While working on a design system, we wanted to include not only visual but also navigational guidelines. One of which got published under 'UX Planet'.

title: Design Sprint Masterclass Certificate
description: I am a big fan of the Design Sprint by Jake Knapp even though I like to bend the ruled. But I can do that now with confidence after learning the rules in their masterclass.

title: Scrum Product Owner Certificate
description: Though I never worked as a product owner, this class gave me a good understanding about working in a team with diverse roles.

title: OOUXer of the Month: May 2025
description: While taking the OOUX foundations course I was thrilled that my work for it got recognized and posted about. Though not a flashy achievement it is one I hold dear to my heart.
